cyclone.name: DORIAN
cyclone.current_location: about 10 miles WSW of Cape Hatteras, North Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: tracking northeast along the North Carolina Outer Banks, then accelerating toward extreme SE New England and Nova Scotia
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Outer Banks near Cape Hatteras, NC

port.name: Port of Palm Beach District, FL

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch for Nova Scotia; various Tropical Storm Watches from Prince Edward Island to Newfoundland
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning Surf City NC to NC/VA border; Tropical Storm Warning NC/VA border to Fenwick Island DE and parts of New England
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Carolina coast, Mid-Atlantic coast, southeastern New England and Atlantic Canada
weather_observation.wind: No tropical-storm-force winds expected at Port of Palm Beach.
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected for Port of Palm Beach.
weather_observation.rainfall: No heavy rainfall expected at Port of Palm Beach from Dorian.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Large swells and dangerous rip currents will continue along the Florida east coast, but direct port operations impacts are minimal.
